resources.string: It is a bridge located near the Mayan farm over the river called Brisas del Nechi, excellent to spend an afternoon with the family
It is the main park located near all the local commerce of the town such as restaurants, small shopping centers and the basilica La Merced
It is a place where there are various spaces available for sports such as basketball soccer fields, motocross track, downhill as well as a medium pool.
It is a space ready for sports where you can find a court that can be used for football and basketball, a skating rink, a large pool, tennis court and gym
Hotel Open 24 hours, We are located in the main park with excellent views to the east, we also offer private parking service for motorcycles

If you are looking for a quiet place to rest and that is away from the hustle and bustle; the Armon√≠a hotel is your best option. We are located diagonally to the new transport terminal of the municipality and close to the hospital. We have rooms for 1 person, couple or family. Each room has a private bathroom, hot water, digital television and internet.

We have the best service at your disposal, rooms with breakfast included It has at your service comfortable rooms with private bathroom, hot water, color TV, WiFi (FREE), If you want to share a special night with your partner, we have the best option

We have at your disposal excellent and comfortable facilities, very good service and low prices. Located in the center of the city two blocks from the central park with cheap parking spaces close to the hotel and good restaurants around
We are located in the transport terminal, we have comfortable rooms, gym, Turkish bath and synthetic court
